Class BattlePanel1

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent
                    |
                    +--javax.swing.JPanel
                          |
                          +--BattlePanel1
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class BattlePanel1
extends javax.swing.JPanel

BattlePanel1 is the class responsible for any battles that take place in pokemon. It takes care of all the animations for the battle, as well as communicating with the user and executing the user's commands. It interacts with pokemon to deal out the damages as well as evolves them when they reach the right point. It also interacts with the trainer to dish out the spoils of battle and use their items.

See Also:

 class BattlePanel1.Listener3
          Runs to animate the battle beginning if the enemy trainer's pokemon is knocked out, and keeps track of the pokemons' health.

Constructor Detail

BattlePanel1

public BattlePanel1(Labels l,
                    Scoreboard k)
Constructs a BattlePanel1 that has contact to the scoreboard and labels so it can keep them up to date. It colors the entire battle screen black, and resets the coordinates that the pokemon's icons will start at.

Parameters:
l - Assigns l to label
k - Assigns k to score

commenceBattle

public void commenceBattle(Trainer tr,
                           Pokemon c,
                           Pokemon d)
Starts a battle between the trainer and a wild pokemon.

Parameters:
tr - Assigns tr to trainer.
c - Assigns c to pokemon a (the trainer's active pokemon)
d - Assigns d to b (the wild pokemon)

commenceBattle

public void commenceBattle(Trainer tr,
                           Trainer tr2)
Starts a battle between 2 different trainers or is used when a pokemon is knocked out during a trainer battle and the trainer needs to call another pokemon.

Parameters:
tr - Assigns tr to trainer (the user)
tr2 - Assigns tr2 to trainer2 (the trainer the user is fighting)

battleBegin3

public void battleBegin3()
Used as the animation for if an enemy trainer's pokemon is knocked out and they have to switch pokemon.

commenceBattle2

                            Pokemon c)
Used for when a trainer is fighting a wild pokemon, and his active pokemon is knocked out.

Parameters:
tr - Assigns tr to trainer
c - Assigns c to pokemon (the pokemon that the trainer is bringing out)

Code for the enemy pokemon attacking the user's pokemon.

endBattle

public void endBattle(boolean x)
Called when a pokemon is knocked out, it either ends the battle or re-instantiates a new battle with one of the trainer's next pokemon.

Parameters:
x - Used to determine whether the user's pokemon or the enemy pokemon was knocked out.
